text: 59|23|anta allāhvait tavira vaṇakkattiṟkuriya vēṟoru iṟaivaṉumillai. Avaṉtāṉ meyyāṉa aracaṉ; paricuttamāṉavaṉ; cāntiyum camātāṉamum aḷippavaṉ; apayamaḷippavaṉ; pātukāvalaṉ; (aṉaivaraiyum) mikaittavaṉ; aṭakki āḷupavaṉ; perumaikkuriyavaṉ. Ivarkaḷ kūṟum iṇai tuṇaikaḷai viṭṭu allāh mikap paricuttamāṉavaṉ
